system.Text:
__When you are brought to the brink of desolation__, roll +heart.

On a __strong hit__, you resist and press on.

On a __weak hit__, choose one.

  * Your spirit breaks, but not before you make a noble sacrifice. Envision your final moments.
  * You see a vision of a dreaded event coming to pass. Envision that dark future, and @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.9c9ab6a42daa96e0]{Swear an Iron Vow} to prevent it through an extreme quest. You return to your senses and must mark __tormented__. When you complete the soul-bound quest, clear the impact.

On a __miss__, you succumb to despair or horror and are lost.
